resources.string: :(( Perhaps it\'s the economy? Perhaps it\'s the choices of stocks? See below fore more details.
Hmmm... a bit in the middle. See below for more info with the S&P

Have you held this stock for 3 weeks or less? If so, keep holding for at least 5 more weeks! Chances are, you have just found a great growth stock. This technique is known as the "8-Week-Hold-Rule." Because of how fast the stock is growing, it could have huge chances of becoming a winner!

If not, you should maybe think about selling! Though it may still have the potential to grow, more likely than not, investors will take their profits and cash-out. Over a 20% profit margin is already quite significant; waiting any longer may lead the stock to fall...
Congrats on the earnings! If you have held this stock for significantly longer than 8 weeks, perhaps think about cashing out. Though ultimately use your best judgement. :)
You are almost matching the SP500! Good job overall, especially if you are new! Keep it up! :)
Wow, you. are. a. natural. Keep it up!
Hmm... Perhaps thinking about putting some money in the S&P 500 ETF. It is realitively safer than just stocks and may yield a greater outcome in the future. However, don\'t let this discourage you!
